heroDescription: My goal is to always deliver **scalable**, **maintainable**, and **clean code** for seamless user and developer experiences.

aazol.name: Aazol
aazol.shortDescription: An artisanal food brand offering traditional, sustainably sourced Maharashtrian delicacies online, blending health and taste.

epigamia.name: Epigamia
epigamia.shortDescription: A food brand offering high-protein Greek yogurt and dairy-free products, promoting healthy, modern snacking.

blackberrys.name: Blackberrys
blackberrys.shortDescription: A premium menswear brand redefining sharp, stylish clothing with a modern edge for professionals and trendsetters.

xyxx.name: XYXX
xyxx.shortDescription: A modern menswear brand specializing in comfortable, stylish, and sustainable innerwear that redefines everyday essentials.

sound-scape.name: Soundscape
sound-scape.shortDescription: A cutting-edge audio brand creating immersive sound experiences with innovative headphones and speakers for music lovers.

ether-editor.name: Ether editor
ether-editor.shortDescription: A powerful online text editor that enhances your writing experience with seamless collaboration, intuitive tools, and real-time editing.

organic-nutrient.name: Organic Nutrient
organic-nutrient.shortDescription: A vibrant platform to promote a healthy lifestyle through rich insights on various fruits, including nutritional benefits and seasonal availability.

4700bc.name: 4700BC
4700bc.description1: 4700BC is a **premium popcorn brand** that artfully combines unique flavors with high-quality ingredients. I implemented a **user-friendly** interface featuring smooth navigation and an **integrated payment system**, ensuring a seamless shopping experience.
4700bc.description2: The project prioritized **performance optimization**, resulting in faster load times and improved user satisfaction. By addressing **responsive design** challenges, I ensured accessibility across devices, which successfully **increased user engagement** and sales during the launch phase.

sustain-nature-nest.name: Sustain Nature Nest
sustain-nature-nest.description1: Sustain Nature Nest is a dedicated platform for exploring **waste categories** and promoting eco-friendly practices. I concentrated on integrating OpenAI features to enable **AI-driven image** and **text searches**, allowing users to quickly find relevant information in **21 languages**.
sustain-nature-nest.description2: By providing easy access to valuable resources, it fosters informed decision-making and encourages a collective effort toward a more **sustainable future**.

advanced-automation.name: Automation for Modern MSPs
advanced-automation.description1: Advanced Automation is a **CRM solution** tailored for Managed Service Providers (MSPs), enhancing operational efficiency through integrated features like task scheduling, ticket management, and resource allocation. These capabilities **streamline service delivery**, ensuring optimal customer interactions and satisfaction.
advanced-automation.description2: Throughout the project, I collaborated with cross-functional teams to navigate challenges in integrating various functionalities while maintaining performance. By employing a **modular approach**, I created an intuitive platform that significantly **boosted productivity** and **revenue**, ultimately enhancing the overall user experience.

aboutDescription2: A passionate **frontend developer** from India, with over **{{years}} years** of global experience.
aboutDescription4: By applying a **modular approach** and leveraging **web performance optimization techniques** for the best developer and user experience.
beyondWorkDescription1: I’m proud to be ranked **11th globally** on **CSSBattle**, where I solve challenges with creativity and precision.
beyondWorkDescription2: Enjoy **solving puzzles** like the Rubik’s cube, 2x2, Pyraminx, and more—able to solve a Rubik’s cube in under **15 seconds**.

acronis.name: Acronis
acronis.description1: **Acronis** is a leading global provider of **cyber protection solutions**, dedicated to ensuring **data security** and **recovery** for businesses worldwide.
acronis.description2: As a **Software Developer**, I play a crucial role in this mission by delivering **modular** and **scalable** code. As part of Acronis's global **R&D team**, I have developed **CRM system solutions**, improved the **UI kit** and **UI constructor**, and designed **task management tools**. Additionally, I’ve implemented **AI-driven solutions** that streamline project management and improve productivity.

marmeto.name: Marmeto
marmeto.description1: **Marmeto** is an an **e-commerce solutions provider** specializing in building **custom Shopify experiences**, I focused on building **custom solutions** and **components** for e-commerce stores. This involved developing Shopify scripts for **checkout discounts** and **payment methods**, boosting **conversion rates**, and building a **PIN code checker** to reduce cart abandonment.
marmeto.description2: Alongside **optimizing web performance**, implemented **metafield-based tag filtering** to boost product visibility, and integrated **third-party apps** for customer reviews, chat support, and social media, enhancing overall store functionality, user engagement, and **increasing revenue**

temairazu.name: Temairazu
temairazu.description1: **Temairazu** specializes in **hotel channel management** and digital solutions for the **hospitality industry**, enhancing user experience and **operational efficiency** for hotels.
temairazu.description2: As a Web Engineer Intern, I contributed to the **redesign** of their website, focusing on improving user engagement. I integrated RESTful APIs for **real-time newsfeeds** with **multilingual support**, enhancing user interaction and accessibility.

marmeto-01.name: Marmeto
marmeto-01.description1: **Marmeto** is an innovative **e-commerce solutions provider** that specializes in enhancing **online presence** for businesses. They offer tailored solutions for **Shopify stores**, helping clients boost **conversion rates** and improve user experiences through **customized functionalities**.
marmeto-01.description2: As a Frontend Developer Intern, I developed **custom UI components** to meet the unique needs of various e-commerce stores. Collaborating with the **development**, **design**, and **testing teams**, I ensured seamless integration of these components.
